trans-unit.source: Defines the relationship between a data item and the node it is binding to in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控件中定义数据项与该数据项绑定到的节点之间的关系。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source where each data item contains multiple fields (such as an XML element with several attributes), a node displays the value that is returned by the `ToString` method of the data item, by default.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件绑定到数据源，其中每个数据项包含多个字段 （如具有多个特性的 XML 元素），一个节点显示返回的值`ToString`的数据项，默认情况下的方法。

trans-unit.source: In the case of an XML element, the node displays the element name, which shows the underlying structure of the tree, but is not very useful otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 对于 XML 元素，该节点显示的元素名称，但显示的基础结构的树中，否则不是非常有用。

trans-unit.source: You can bind the properties of a node to a specific field by specifying tree node bindings.
trans-unit.target: 通过指定的树节点绑定，可以绑定到的特定字段的节点的属性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object defines the relationship between each data item and the node that it is binding to.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>对象定义的每个数据项和它所绑定到的节点之间的关系。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control stores its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A> property and applies the bindings to the data source to create a one-to-one relationship between the tree hierarchy and the data source hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制存储其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>中的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A>属性并将绑定应用于要创建树层次结构和数据源层次结构之间的一对一关系的数据源。

trans-unit.source: For each data item in the data source, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control attempts to match the data item to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object in order to create the corresponding <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: 为数据源中的每个数据项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件尝试匹配数据项目写入到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>才能创建相应的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>对象。

trans-unit.source: When creating a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object, you must specify the criteria for binding.
trans-unit.target: 在创建时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>对象，你必须指定用于绑定的条件。

trans-unit.source: The criteria indicates when a data item should be bound to a node.
trans-unit.target: 条件指示当数据项应绑定到的节点。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A> property, or both properties.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A>属性或这两个属性。

trans-unit.source: There is a slight performance gain by specifying both.
trans-unit.target: 通过指定没有略微的性能提升。

trans-unit.source: A node depth specifies the node level that gets bound.
trans-unit.target: 节点深度指定获取绑定的节点级别。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> declaration binds the `Name` and `ID` fields of the data source to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> properties, respectively, of all nodes with a depth of 0:
trans-unit.target: 例如，以下<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>声明绑定`Name`和`ID`字段的数据源到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>属性，分别的所有节点的深度为 0:

trans-unit.source: A data member specifies the type of the data item in the underlying data source, but can represent different information depending on the data source.
trans-unit.target: 数据成员在基础数据源中，指定的数据项目类型，但可以表示不同的信息，具体取决于数据源。

trans-unit.source: Each data item in a hierarchical data source (represented by a <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface) exposes a <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.Type%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, which specifies the type of the data item.
trans-unit.target: 层次结构数据源中的每个数据项 (由表示<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData?displayProperty=nameWithType>接口) 公开<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.Type%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性，用于指定数据项目的类型。

trans-unit.source: For example, the data member for an XML element specifies the name of the element.
trans-unit.target: 例如，XML 元素的数据成员指定元素的名称。

trans-unit.source: When a data source contains multiple data item types, the data member specifies which data item type to use.
trans-unit.target: 数据成员时数据源包含多个数据项目类型，指定的数据项目类型使用。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> declaration binds the `<Book>` elements of an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> control to all the nodes in the tree, regardless of the location in the hierarchy:
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>声明绑定`<Book>`元素<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>控件添加到树中，而不考虑层次结构中的位置中的所有节点：

trans-unit.source: Once the binding criteria is established, you can then bind a property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object that can be bound to a value.
trans-unit.target: 一旦建立绑定条件时，你可以随后绑定的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>可以绑定到一个值的对象。

trans-unit.source: You can bind to a field of a data item or to a static value.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将绑定到数据项目的字段或为静态值。

trans-unit.source: When bound to a static value, all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied share the same value.
trans-unit.target: 当绑定到静态值，所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>对象向其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>应用对象共享相同的值。

trans-unit.source: You can selectively override a bound property in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object by setting the corresponding property directly in the node.
trans-unit.target: 你可以选择性地重写中的绑定的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>通过在节点上直接设置对应的属性的对象。

trans-unit.target: 下表列出的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>允许您绑定的属性的类<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>数据项的字段的对象。

trans-unit.source: If conflicting <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> objects are defined, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control applies the tree node bindings in the following order of precedence:
trans-unit.target: 如果冲突<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>定义对象，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件适用以下优先顺序中的树节点绑定：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object that defines and matches both a depth and a data member.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>定义并匹配深度和数据成员的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object that defines and matches the data member only.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>定义并匹配的数据成员的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object that defines and matches the depth only.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>对象定义并匹配仅的深度。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object that defines neither the depth nor the data member.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>定义既不深度，也不数据成员的对象。

trans-unit.source: (This type of tree node binding is applied to all nodes in the tree.)
trans-unit.target: （此类型的树节点绑定适用于在树中的所有节点。）

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object that does not have a match in the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>数据源中没有匹配项的对象。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the value that is returned by the `ToString` method of the data item is then bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> properties of the nodes to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，通过返回的值`ToString`数据项方法然后绑定到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>了节点属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>应用对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> class also allows you to format the text that is displayed in a node by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.FormatString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>类还允许您通过设置显示在节点的文本格式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.FormatString%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows some example tree node binding declarations.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示绑定声明的某些示例树节点。

trans-unit.source: Example binding
trans-unit.target: 示例绑定

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Binds the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> properties of all nodes in the tree to the `Title` and `ID` fields of the data source, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 将绑定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>到树中的所有节点的属性`Title`和`ID`字段的数据源，分别。

trans-unit.source: All nodes use this tree node binding declaration because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A> properties are not set.
trans-unit.target: 因为所有节点都使用此树节点绑定声明<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A>未设置属性。

trans-unit.source: Binds the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> properties of all nodes in the tree to the `Title` and `ID` fields of the `Book` data item in the data source, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 将绑定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>到树中的所有节点的属性`Title`和`ID`字段`Book`在数据源中，会分别项数据。

trans-unit.source: Binds the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> properties of all nodes with a depth of 2 in the tree to the `Title` and `ID` fields of the data item in the data source, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 将绑定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>所有节点的深度为 2 的关系树中的属性`Title`和`ID`在数据源中，会分别项的数据的字段。

trans-unit.source: Binds the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> properties of all nodes with a depth of 2 in the tree to the `Title` and `ID` fields of the `Book` data item in the data source, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 将绑定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>所有节点的深度为 2 的关系树中的属性`Title`和`ID`字段`Book`在数据源中，会分别项数据。

trans-unit.source: Also binds the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A> property of the nodes to a static value.
trans-unit.target: 此外会将绑定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A>为静态值节点的属性。

trans-unit.source: This section contains three code examples.
trans-unit.target: 本部分包含三个代码示例。

trans-unit.source: The first code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> objects declaratively to define the relationship between a node and a data item.
trans-unit.target: 第一个代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>对象以声明方式来定义节点和数据项之间的关系。

trans-unit.source: The second code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> objects programmatically to define the relationship between a node and a data item.
trans-unit.target: 第二个代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>对象以编程方式来定义节点和数据项之间的关系。

trans-unit.source: The third code example provides sample XML data for the first and second code examples.
trans-unit.target: 第三个代码示例提供的第一个和第二个代码示例的示例 XML 数据。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> objects declaratively to define the relationship between a node and a data item.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>对象以声明方式来定义节点和数据项之间的关系。

trans-unit.source: For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Book.xml.
trans-unit.target: 对于此示例中正常工作，你必须复制此代码示例，到名为 Book.xml 后面提供的示例 XML 数据。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> objects programmatically to define the relationship between a node and a data item.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>对象以编程方式来定义节点和数据项之间的关系。

trans-unit.source: For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data that is provided in the next code example to a file named Book.xml.
trans-unit.target: 对于此示例正常工作，必须将提供的示例 XML 数据复制到名为 Book.xml 下面的代码示例中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example provides sample XML data for the preceding code examples.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例提供了有关前面的代码示例的示例 XML 数据。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.%23ctor%2A> constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.%23ctor%2A>构造函数初始化的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>类。

trans-unit.source: It is often used when dynamically populating the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A> collection of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 它通常用于动态填充时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.%23ctor%2A> constructor to add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object dynamically to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A> collection of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.%23ctor%2A>构造函数来添加<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>动态对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value to match against a <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.Type" /> property for a data item to determine whether to apply the tree node binding.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与数据项的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.Type" /> 属性进行匹配以确定是否应用树节点绑定的值。

trans-unit.source: The value to match against a data item's <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.Type" /> property to determine whether to apply the tree node binding.
trans-unit.target: 与数据项的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.Type" /> 属性进行匹配以确定是否应用树节点绑定的值。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember" /> property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: A data member specifies the type of the data item in the underlying data source, but can represent different information depending on the data source.
trans-unit.target: 数据成员在基础数据源中，指定的数据项目类型，但可以表示不同的信息，具体取决于数据源。

trans-unit.source: Each data item in a hierarchical data source (represented by a <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData?displayProperty=nameWithType> object) exposes a <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.Type%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, which specifies the type of the data item.
trans-unit.target: 层次结构数据源中的每个数据项 (由表示<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData?displayProperty=nameWithType>对象) 公开<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.Type%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性，用于指定数据项目的类型。

trans-unit.source: For example, the data member for an XML element specifies the name of the element.
trans-unit.target: 例如，XML 元素的数据成员指定元素的名称。

trans-unit.source: When a data source contains multiple data item types, the data member specifies which data item type to use.
trans-unit.target: 数据成员时数据源包含多个数据项目类型，指定的数据项目类型使用。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> declaration binds the `<Book>` elements of an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> control to all the nodes in the tree, regardless of the location in the hierarchy:
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>声明绑定`<Book>`元素<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>控件添加到树中，而不考虑层次结构中的位置中的所有节点：

trans-unit.source: When creating a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object, you must specify the criteria for binding.
trans-unit.target: 在创建时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>对象，你必须指定用于绑定的条件。

trans-unit.source: The criteria indicates when a data item should be bound to a node.
trans-unit.target: 条件指示当数据项应绑定到的节点。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A> property, or both properties.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A>属性或这两个属性。

trans-unit.source: There is a slight performance gain by specifying both.
trans-unit.target: 通过指定没有略微的性能提升。

trans-unit.source: Once the binding criteria is established, you can then bind a property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object that can be bound to a value.
trans-unit.target: 一旦建立绑定条件时，你可以随后绑定的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>可以绑定到一个值的对象。

trans-unit.source: You can bind to a field of a data item or to a static value.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将绑定到数据项目的字段或为静态值。

trans-unit.source: When bound to a static value, all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied share the same value.
trans-unit.target: 当绑定到静态值，所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>对象向其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>应用对象共享相同的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: A node depth specifies the node level that gets bound.

trans-unit.source: When creating a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object, you must specify the criteria for binding.

trans-unit.source: The criteria indicates when a data item should be bound to a node.
trans-unit.target: 条件指示当数据项应绑定到的节点。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A> property, or both properties.

trans-unit.source: There is a slight performance gain by specifying both.

trans-unit.source: Once the binding criteria is established, you can then bind a property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object that can be bound to a value.
trans-unit.target: 一旦建立绑定条件时，你可以随后绑定的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>可以绑定到一个值的对象。

trans-unit.source: You can bind to a field of a data item or to a static value.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将绑定到数据项目的字段或为静态值。

trans-unit.target: 当绑定到静态值，所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>对象向其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>应用对象共享相同的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the string that specifies the display format for the text of a node to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置字符串，指定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> 对象应用到的节点的文本显示格式。

trans-unit.source: A formatting string that specifies the display format for the text of a node to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 格式字符串，指定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> 对象应用到的节点的文本显示格式。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.FormatString" /> property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.FormatString" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.FormatString%2A> property is used to provide a custom format for a node's text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.FormatString%2A>属性用于为节点的文本提供自定义格式。

trans-unit.source: The data format string consists of two parts, separated by a colon, in the form { `A` : `Bxx` }.
trans-unit.target: 数据格式字符串包含的形式，以冒号分隔的两个部分 { `A` : `Bxx` }。

trans-unit.source: For example, the formatting string `{0:F2}` displays a fixed-point number with two decimal places.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在格式设置字符串`{0:F2}`显示一个带两位小数定点数。

trans-unit.source: The entire string must be enclosed in braces to indicate that it is a format string and not a literal string.
trans-unit.target: 整个字符串必须括在大括号以指示它是一个格式字符串而不是文本字符串。

trans-unit.source: Any text outside the braces is displayed as literal text.
trans-unit.target: 大括号外的任何文本显示为文字文本。

trans-unit.source: The value before the colon (`A` in the general example) specifies the parameter index in a zero-based list of parameters.
trans-unit.target: 冒号前的值 (`A`常规示例中) 从零开始的参数列表中，指定的参数索引。

trans-unit.source: This value can be set only to 0 because there is only one value in each node.
trans-unit.target: 因为每个节点中只有一个值，此值可以设置只为 0。

trans-unit.source: The character after the colon (`B` in the general example) specifies the display format for the value.
trans-unit.target: 冒号后面的字符 (`B`常规示例中) 指定值的显示格式。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the common formats.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了常见的格式。

trans-unit.source: Format character
trans-unit.target: 格式字符

trans-unit.source: Displays numeric values in
trans-unit.target: 显示数字值在

trans-unit.source: Currency format.
trans-unit.target: 货币格式。

trans-unit.source: Decimal format.
trans-unit.target: 十进制格式。

trans-unit.source: Scientific (exponential) format.
trans-unit.target: 科学记数 （指数） 格式。

trans-unit.source: Fixed format.
trans-unit.target: 固定的格式。

trans-unit.source: General format.
trans-unit.target: 常规格式。

trans-unit.source: Number format.
trans-unit.target: 数值格式。

trans-unit.source: Hexadecimal format.
trans-unit.target: 十六进制格式。

trans-unit.source: Except for `X`, the format character is not case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 除`X`，格式字符不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: The `X` format character displays the hexadecimal characters in the case that is specified.
trans-unit.target: `X`格式字符在指定的情况下显示的十六进制字符。

trans-unit.source: The value after the format character (`xx` in the general example) specifies the number of significant digits or decimal places to display.
trans-unit.target: 格式字符后的值 (`xx`常规示例中) 指定的有效位数或小数位数显示数量。

trans-unit.source: For more information on formatting strings, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关设置字符串格式的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.FormatString%2A> property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.FormatString%2A>属性，设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ToolTip text for the image that is displayed next to a node to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置显示在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> 对象应用到的节点旁边的图像的 ToolTip 文本。

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip text for the image that is displayed next to a node to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 显示在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> 对象应用到的节点旁边的图像的 ToolTip 文本。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTip property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示未设置 P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTip 属性。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTip%2A> property to specify the value to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件绑定到数据源，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTip%2A>属性来指定要绑定到的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>对象。

trans-unit.source: The text that you specify provides Assistive Technology devices with a description of the image that can be used to make the control more accessible.
trans-unit.target: 你指定的文本，提供可用来使控件更易于访问的映像的说明的辅助技术设备。

trans-unit.source: This binding relationship affects all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 此绑定关系影响所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>对象向其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>应用对象。

trans-unit.source: When an image is displayed next to a node, the ToolTip text is displayed when the mouse pointer is positioned over the image.
trans-unit.target: 当节点旁边显示映像时，当鼠标指针定位图像上方时显示的工具提示文本。

trans-unit.source: You can selectively override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTip%2A> property by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A> property of each node directly.
trans-unit.target: 你可以选择性地重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTip%2A>通过设置属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A>直接每个节点的属性。

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTip%2A> property to bind the same ToolTip text to each node image, you can bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object to a field of a data source by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTipField%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 而不是使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTip%2A>属性将相同的工具提示文本绑定到每个节点映像，你可以将绑定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>通过设置数据源的字段的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTipField%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control displays a hyperlink for the text of the node, instead of plain text.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性时，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件显示的节点，而不是纯文本的文本的超链接。

trans-unit.source: You can also optionally set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A> property to specify the window or frame in which to display the linked content.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以选择设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A>属性指定的窗口或框架中显示的链接的内容。

trans-unit.source: You can selectively override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrl%2A> property by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> property of each node directly.
trans-unit.target: 你可以选择性地重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrl%2A>通过设置属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>直接每个节点的属性。

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrl%2A> property to bind the same URL to each node, you can bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object to a field of a data source by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrlField%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 而不是使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrl%2A>属性将相同的 URL 绑定到每个节点中，你可以将绑定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>通过设置数据源的字段的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrlField%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.target: 第一个代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrl%2A>属性来指定要向其节点时链接到的 URL<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>应用对象时发生。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrl%2A>属性来指定要向其节点时链接到的 URL<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>应用对象时发生。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the field from the data source to bind to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> object to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置数据源中字段的名称，该字段将绑定到 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl" /> 对象将应用到的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> 对象的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: The name of the field to bind to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> object to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 要绑定到 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl" /> 对象应用到的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> 对象的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> 属性的字段名称。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrlField" /> property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrlField" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrlField%2A> property to specify the field name to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件绑定到数据源，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrlField%2A>属性来指定要绑定到的字段名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>对象。

trans-unit.source: This binding relationship affects all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 此绑定关系影响所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>对象向其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>应用对象。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrlField%2A> property is set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control displays a hyperlink for the text of the node, instead of plain text.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrlField%2A>设置属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件显示的节点，而不是纯文本的文本的超链接。

trans-unit.source: You can also optionally set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A> property to specify the window or frame in which to display the linked content.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以选择设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A>属性指定的窗口或框架中显示的链接的内容。

trans-unit.source: You can selectively override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrlField%2A> property by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> property of each node directly.
trans-unit.target: 你可以选择性地重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrlField%2A>通过设置属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>直接每个节点的属性。

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrlField%2A> property to bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object to a field, you can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> property to a fixed value by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 而不是使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrlField%2A>属性将绑定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>对象移到一个字段，你可以设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>属性通过设置的固定值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrl%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the data source contains multiple fields, you must first set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A> property, or both properties in order to bind to the appropriate field.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据源包含多个字段，则必须首先设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A>属性或这两个属性以便将绑定到相应的字段。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.target: 第一个代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrlField%2A>属性来指定要绑定到的 XML 元素的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>应用对象。

trans-unit.target: 第二个代码示例为第一个代码示例提供示例 XML 数据。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrlField%2A>属性来指定要绑定到的 XML 元素的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>应用对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the node to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> object is applied is populated dynamically.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指示是否动态填充 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> 对象应用到的节点。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to populate the node to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> object is applied dynamically; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果动态填充 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> 对象应用到的节点，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes, it is not practical to statically predefine the tree structure due to data size or custom content that depends on user input.
trans-unit.target: 有时，它是不可行静态预定义树形结构由于数据大小或依赖于用户输入的自定义内容。

trans-unit.source: Because of this, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control supports dynamic node population.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件支持动态节点填充。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.PopulateOnDemand%2A> property is set to `true`, the child nodes of the node that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied to gets populated at run time when the node is expanded.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.PopulateOnDemand%2A>属性设置为`true`，节点的子节点的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>对象应用于获取填充在该节点已展开时的运行时。

trans-unit.source: When data bindings are created by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.AutoGenerateDataBindings%2A> of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control to `true`, the bindings that are created have the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.PopulateOnDemand%2A> property set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定中设置的创建时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.AutoGenerateDataBindings%2A>的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制转移到`true`，创建的绑定具有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.PopulateOnDemand%2A>属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: Data bindings that are created declaratively have the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.PopulateOnDemand%2A> property set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 以声明方式创建的数据绑定都具有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.PopulateOnDemand%2A>属性设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: Using the declarative syntax allows you to control the behavior of individual data bindings.
trans-unit.target: 使用声明性语法，可控制各个数据绑定的行为。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> class, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.PopulateOnDemand%2A> property does not require an event-handling method to be defined for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate> event, if you are using a data source control, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>.
trans-unit.target: 与不同<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>类，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.PopulateOnDemand%2A>属性不需要为定义的事件处理方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate>事件，如果你正在使用数据源控件，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>。

trans-unit.source: Instead, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control dynamically generates an event-handling method using the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 相反，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件动态生成使用的属性的事件处理方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>中的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: You can still define an event-handling method for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate> event; however, it will be called after the event-handling method for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 您仍然可以定义的事件处理方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate>事件; 但是，将调用之后的事件处理方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Supported browsers can also take advantage of client-side node population.
trans-unit.target: 支持的浏览器还可以利用客户端节点填充。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, this allows the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control to populate a node dynamically on the client when that node is expanded, preventing the need to post back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用，这将允许<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件来填充动态客户端上的节点，展开该节点时，免除回发到服务器的需要。

trans-unit.source: For more information on client-side node population, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PopulateNodesFromClient%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关客户端节点填充的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PopulateNodesFromClient%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example.
trans-unit.target: 第二个代码示例为第一个代码示例提供示例 XML 数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the event or events to raise when a node to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> object is applied is selected.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当选定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> 对象应用到的节点时引发的事件。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="TreeNodeSelectAction.Select" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="TreeNodeSelectAction.Select" />。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.SelectAction%2A> property to specify the value to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件绑定到数据源，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.SelectAction%2A>属性来指定要绑定到的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>对象。

trans-unit.source: This binding relationship affects all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 此绑定关系影响所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>对象向其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>应用对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property is used to specify which event or events are raised when a node is selected.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>属性用于指定在选定节点时，将引发哪些事件。

trans-unit.source: You can selectively override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.SelectAction%2A> property by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property of each node directly.
trans-unit.target: 你可以选择性地重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.SelectAction%2A>通过设置属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>直接每个节点的属性。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available options.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可用的选项。

trans-unit.source: `SelectAction` value
trans-unit.target: `SelectAction` 值

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Toggles the node between expanded and collapsed.
trans-unit.target: 切换展开和折叠状态之间的节点。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded> event or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeCollapsed> event, as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded>事件或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeCollapsed>事件，根据需要。

trans-unit.source: Raises no events when a node is selected.
trans-unit.target: 在选定节点时不引发任何事件。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> event when a node is selected.
trans-unit.target: 在选定节点时引发 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raises both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded> events when a node is selected.
trans-unit.target: 在选定节点时引发 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> 和 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded> 两个事件。

trans-unit.source: Nodes are only expanded, never collapsed.
trans-unit.target: 仅展开节点，永远不会折叠。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A> is not rendered for a node with its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property set to `TreeNodeSelectAction.None`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>的节点不呈现其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>属性设置为`TreeNodeSelectAction.None`。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.target: 本部分包含两个代码示例。

trans-unit.source: The first code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.SelectAction%2A> property to specify which event is raised when a node is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 第一个代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.SelectAction%2A>属性指定单击节点时引发的事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a check box is displayed next to a node to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指示是否在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> 对象应用到的节点旁边显示复选框。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display a check box next to a node to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> object is applied; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> 对象应用到的节点旁边显示复选框，则为 <see langword="true" />，否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: To provide multinode selection support in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control, you can display check boxes next to an image in the node.
trans-unit.target: 若要提供中的多节点选择支持<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件，可以在节点中显示的图像旁边的复选框。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ShowCheckBox%2A> property to specify the value to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ShowCheckBox%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件绑定到数据源，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ShowCheckBox%2A>属性来指定要绑定到的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ShowCheckBox%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>对象。

trans-unit.source: This binding relationship affects all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 此绑定关系影响所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>对象向其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>应用对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ShowCheckBox%2A> property is used to show or hide the check box for a node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ShowCheckBox%2A>属性用于显示或隐藏节点的复选框。

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ShowCheckBox%2A> property can be used to display check boxes, it is more common to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 尽管<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ShowCheckBox%2A>属性可以用于显示复选框，则更常见的是使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A> property affects every node type that is specified by the property; therefore, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ShowCheckBox%2A> property is often used to override that setting for a node to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 但是，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A>属性会影响每个节点类型指定的属性; 因此，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ShowCheckBox%2A>属性通常用于重写到的节点该设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>应用对象。

trans-unit.source: You can selectively override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ShowCheckBox%2A> property by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ShowCheckBox%2A> property of each node directly.
trans-unit.target: 你可以选择性地重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ShowCheckBox%2A>通过设置属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ShowCheckBox%2A>直接每个节点的属性。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the target window or frame in which to display the Web page content that is associated with a node to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在其中显示与 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> 对象应用到的节点关联的网页内容的目标窗口或框架。

trans-unit.source: The target window or frame in which to display the linked Web page content.
trans-unit.target: 显示所链接的网页内容的目标窗口或框架。

trans-unit.source: Values must begin with a letter in the range of A through Z (case insensitive), except for certain special values that begin with an underscore, as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 值必须以 A 到 Z 范围内的字母（不区分大小写）打头，但某些以下划线打头的特殊值除外，如下表所示：

trans-unit.source: <list type="table"><listheader><term> Target value
trans-unit.target: <list type="table"><listheader><term> 目标值

trans-unit.source: </term><description> Description
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 描述

trans-unit.source: </description></listheader><item><term><see langword="_blank" /></term><description> Renders the content in a new window without frames.
trans-unit.target: </description></listheader><item><term><see langword="_blank" /></term><description> 呈现在新窗口中没有框架的内容。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term><see langword="_parent" /></term><description> Renders the content in the immediate frameset parent.
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term><see langword="_parent" /></term><description> 呈现的即时框架集父代中的内容。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term><see langword="_search" /></term><description> Renders the content in the search pane.
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term><see langword="_search" /></term><description> 呈现搜索窗格中的内容。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term><see langword="_self" /></term><description> Renders the content in the frame with focus.
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term><see langword="_self" /></term><description> 呈现具有焦点的框架中的内容。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term><see langword="_top" /></term><description> Renders the content in the full window without frames.
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term><see langword="_top" /></term><description> 呈现没有框架的完整窗口中的内容。

trans-unit.source: Check your browser documentation to determine if the <see langword="_search" /> value is supported.
trans-unit.target: 请查看浏览器文档，确定是否支持 <see langword="_search" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer version 5.0 and later supports the <see langword="_search" /> target value.
trans-unit.target: 例如，Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 版和更高版本支持 <see langword="_search" /> 目标值。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which refreshes the window or frame with focus.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，这会刷新具有焦点的窗口或框架。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A> property to specify the value to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件绑定到数据源，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A>属性来指定要绑定到的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>对象。

trans-unit.source: This binding relationship affects all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 此绑定关系影响所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>对象向其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>应用对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A> property is used to specify the window or frame in which to display the Web content that is linked to a node when that node is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A>属性用于指定窗口，或单击该节点时，要在其中显示的 Web 内容的帧链接到节点。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A> property overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Target%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control for the nodes to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A>属性重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Target%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>到节点的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>应用对象。

trans-unit.source: You can selectively override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A> property by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A> property of each node directly.
trans-unit.target: 你可以选择性地重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A>通过设置属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A>直接每个节点的属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A> property renders as a `target` attribute.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A>属性呈现为`target`属性。

trans-unit.source: The `target` attribute on `anchor` elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition.
trans-unit.target: `target`属性`anchor`XHTML 1.1 文档类型定义中不允许的元素。

trans-unit.source: Do not set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A> property, if the rendered output for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> control must be XHTML 1.1 compliant.
trans-unit.target: 未设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A>属性，如果呈现的输出<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>控件必须符合 XHTML 1.1。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[在 Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 的 XHTML 标准](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97)。

trans-unit.source: When creating accessible Web pages, you should avoid using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A> property to target another window.
trans-unit.target: 当创建可访问网页，应避免使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A>属性将作为目标另一个窗口。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: ASP.NET Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB: ASP.NET 可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae)。

trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.TargetField%2A> property to bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object to a field, you can set <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A> property to a fixed value by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 而不是使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.TargetField%2A>属性将绑定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>对象移到一个字段，你可以设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A>属性通过设置的固定值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the data source contains multiple fields, you must first set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A> property, or both properties in order to bind to the appropriate field.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串("")。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Text%2A> property to specify the value to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.

trans-unit.source: This binding relationship affects all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> property is used to specify the text displayed in a node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>属性用于指定一个节点中显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: You can selectively override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Text%2A> property by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> property of each node directly.
trans-unit.target: 你可以选择性地重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Text%2A>通过设置属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>直接每个节点的属性。

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Text%2A> property to bind the same text to each node, you can bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object to a field of a data source by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.TextField%2A> property.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.target: 而不是使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ToolTipField%2A>属性将绑定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ToolTip%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>对象移到一个字段，你可以设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ToolTip%2A>属性通过设置的固定值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ToolTip%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the data source contains multiple fields, you must first set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A> property, or both properties in order to bind to the appropriate field.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据源包含多个字段，则必须首先设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A>属性或这两个属性以便将绑定到相应的字段。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember" /> property is <see langword="null" /> or an empty string (""), **(Empty)** is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember" /> 属性为 <see langword="null" /> 或为空字符串 ("")，则返回 (Empty)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a displayed value that is not displayed but is used to store any additional data about a node to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> object is applied, such as data used for handling postback events.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置显示值，该值是不显示的，但用来存储有关 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> 对象应用到的节点的任何其他数据，如用于处理回发事件的数据。

trans-unit.source: Supplemental data about a node to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> object is applied; this data is not displayed.
trans-unit.target: 有关 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> 对象应用到的节点的补充数据，不显示这些数据。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串("")。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Value%2A> property to specify the value to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件绑定到数据源，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Value%2A>属性来指定要绑定到的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>对象。

trans-unit.source: This binding relationship affects all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 此绑定关系影响所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>对象向其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>应用对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> property is used to supplement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> property by storing any additional data associated with the node to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>属性用于补充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>通过将存储到的节点与关联的任何其他数据属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>应用对象。

trans-unit.source: This value is not displayed in the control and is commonly used to store data for handling postback events.
trans-unit.target: 此值不会显示在控件，通常用于存储用于处理回发事件数据。

trans-unit.source: You can selectively override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Value%2A> property by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> property of each node directly.
trans-unit.target: 你可以选择性地重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Value%2A>通过设置属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>直接每个节点的属性。

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Value%2A> property to bind the same value to each node, you can bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object to a field of a data source by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ValueField%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 而不是使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Value%2A>属性将相同的值绑定到每个节点中，你可以将绑定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>通过设置数据源的字段的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ValueField%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the field from the data source to bind to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> object to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置数据源中字段的名称，该字段将绑定到 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value" /> 对象将应用到的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> 对象的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: The name of the field to bind to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> object to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 要绑定到 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value" /> 对象应用到的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> 对象的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> 属性的字段名称。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ValueField" /> property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ValueField" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ValueField%2A> property to specify the field name to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件绑定到数据源，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ValueField%2A>属性来指定要绑定到的字段名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>对象。

trans-unit.source: This binding relationship affects all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 此绑定关系影响所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>对象向其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>应用对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> property is used to supplement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> property by storing any additional data associated with the node to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>属性用于补充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>通过将存储到的节点与关联的任何其他数据属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>应用对象。

trans-unit.source: This value is not displayed in the control and is commonly used to store data for handling postback events.
trans-unit.target: 此值不会显示在控件，通常用于存储用于处理回发事件数据。

trans-unit.source: You can selectively override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ValueField%2A> property by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> property of each node directly.
trans-unit.target: 你可以选择性地重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ValueField%2A>通过设置属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>直接每个节点的属性。

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ValueField%2A> property to bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object to an field, you can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> property to a fixed value by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Value%2A> property.

trans-unit.source: If the data source contains multiple fields, you must first set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A> property, or both properties in order to bind to the appropriate field.
